A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I think that Star Wars the last Jedi was an ok movie and for what it was trying to do. But it didn't hit a home run\, my friends and I were really hyped for it and I feel like it just wastes characters and opportunity of the movie. My friends and I came up with endings and different scenarios. I ask myself where were the creative people on this movie. Kinda sad to be honest.
